EmailTemplate.subject: 2 days to epic mixes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-ww/]]>
2 days to epic mixes
Only 2 days to epic mixes.
We look forward to seeing you at Martell’s epic cocktail workshop at Hyde at 53M, on the 18 May @ 9 p.m.
Don’t get lost. Find Hyde here <[[https://goo.gl/maps/KX1TaQwHAi32]]>.
<[[https://www.facebook.com/martell.my]]>
<[[https://www.instagram.com/explore/locations/75798282/]]>
